scripts.report:sucesso: npm run test:sucesso && npx mochawesome-merge cypress/reports/mochawesome-report/*.json > mochawesome-sucesso.json && npx marge mochawesome-sucesso.json --reportDir cypress/reports/sucesso --reportFilename index.html
scripts.report:erro: npm run test:erro && npx mochawesome-merge cypress/reports/mochawesome-report/*.json > mochawesome-erro.json && npx marge mochawesome-erro.json --reportDir cypress/reports/erro --reportFilename index.html
scripts.report:todos: npm run test:todos && npx mochawesome-merge cypress/reports/mochawesome-report/*.json > mochawesome.json && npx marge mochawesome.json --reportDir cypress/reports/geral --reportFilename index.html
